metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27845 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: There's a flaw in src/lib/openjp2/pi.c of openjpeg in versions prior to 2.4.0. If an attacker is able to provide untrusted input to openjpeg's conversion/encoding functionality, they could cause an out-of-bounds read. The highest impact of this flaw is to application availability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ghostscript: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
